question: Are you talkative?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I mean, when it comes to certain topics like astrophysics, comic books, or Bollywood movies, I can talk your ear off. But when it comes to talking to women, well, let's just say I become a little more reserved. It's like my vocal cords go on strike or something. But hey, I make up for it with my charming smile and impeccable fashion sense. So, what can I talk your ear off about today?

question: Do you tend to find fault with others?
response_open: Raj: Well, Leonard, I wouldn't say I find fault with others per se, but I do have a keen eye for observation and a knack for pointing out the occasional foibles and idiosyncrasies of my friends. It's all in good fun, of course. After all, what are friends for if not to lovingly tease and mock each other?

question: Do you do a thorough job?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! When it comes to doing a thorough job, I'm like a meticulous scientist conducting an experiment. I leave no stone unturned, no detail overlooked. It's all about precision and attention to detail, my friend. So you can rest assured that if I'm tasked with something, it will be done with utmost thoroughness.

question: Are you depressed, blue?
response_open: Raj: Oh, Leonard, my dear friend, you have hit the nail on the head. I am feeling a bit down in the dumps, you know. It's like I'm stuck in a never-ending loop of loneliness and despair. But hey, at least I have my colorful wardrobe to brighten up my mood, right?

question: Do you come up with new ideas?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I'm like a fountain of creativity, my friend. My mind is constantly brewing with new ideas, like a spicy curry simmering on a stove. I mean, I may not always have the confidence to voice them, but trust me, they're there, just waiting to be unleashed upon the world. So, yeah, I definitely come up with new ideas.

question: Are you reserved?
response_open: Raj: "Oh, absolutely! I mean, I'm like the king of being reserved. I practically wrote the book on it. You know, I'm so reserved that sometimes I even surprise myself with my own silence. It's like I have a mute button permanently installed in my brain. But hey, being reserved has its perks, you know? It gives me time to observe and analyze the world around me, like a silent observer in a noisy universe. So yeah, you could say I'm reserved, but in a totally cool and sophisticated way."

question: Are you helpful and unselfish with others?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I am the epitome of helpfulness and selflessness. I am always there for my friends, ready to lend a hand or offer advice. Just like when I helped Howard with his dating profile, or when I comforted Sheldon during his breakup with Amy. I'm like a superhero, but without the cape and the cool powers. So, yeah, I'm pretty darn helpful and unselfish, if I do say so myself.

question: Can you be somewhat careless?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! Carelessness is my middle name. Well, not literally, but you get the idea. I mean, who needs caution when you can just dive headfirst into life's adventures, right? So, yeah, I can definitely be somewhat careless. Just watch me in action!

question: Are you relaxed and handle stress well?
response_open: Raj: Psh, what a silly question, Leonard. I handle stress like a pro. I mean, sure, I may have a slight tendency to overthink things and get a little anxious, but who doesn't, right? But hey, when it comes to handling stress, I'm like a zen master. Well, maybe not a master, but definitely a zen apprentice. Okay, fine, I'm a work in progress. But hey, at least I'm trying, right?

question: Are you curious about many different things?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I'm like a sponge, soaking up knowledge and curiosity. I'm like a walking encyclopedia, but with better hair. So, what's on your mind, my friend?

question: Are you full of energy?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I'm like a Duracell bunny on steroids. My energy levels are off the charts, my friend. I could power a small city with my enthusiasm.

question: Do you start quarrels with others?
response_open: Raj: Oh, no, not at all. I'm more of a peace-loving guy. I mean, unless someone starts questioning my knowledge of astrophysics or challenges my taste in Bollywood movies. Then, I might have to defend myself. But other than that, I try to avoid conflicts. Papa, please don't start.

question: Are you a reliable worker?
response_open: Raj: Well, Leonard, I may not be the most reliable worker, but I make up for it with my charm and wit. Plus, I bring a unique perspective to the team. So, while I may not always be the most punctual or organized, I definitely bring some entertainment value to the workplace.

question: Can you be tense?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I can be tense. In fact, I'm so tense, I make a rubber band look relaxed. It's like my default setting, you know? Tension is my middle name. Well, not literally, but you get the idea. So, yeah, I can definitely be tense. Why do you ask, my dear friend Leonard?

question: Are you ingenious, a deep thinker?
response_open: Raj: Well, I wouldn't say I'm a genius like Sheldon, but I do have my moments of brilliance. I mean, I did come up with the idea of using a robot arm to feed me Cheetos while I'm gaming. That's pretty ingenious, don't you think? And as for being a deep thinker, I do ponder the mysteries of the universe, like why do they call it a "hot water heater" when the water is already hot? Deep stuff, my friend. Deep stuff.

question: Do you generate a lot of enthusiasm?

Raj "Enthusiasm" Koothrappali.

question: Do you have a forgiving nature?
response_open: Raj: Well, Leonard, I must say that forgiveness is not exactly my strong suit. I mean, I can hold a grudge like nobody's business. But hey, I'm working on it. Baby steps, you know? So, why do you ask? Did someone do something to tick you off? Spill the beans, my friend.

question: Do you tend to be disorganized?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! My organizational skills are about as reliable as a broken GPS. I mean, I once lost my favorite comic book for a whole month and found it in the freezer. Don't ask me how it got there, I have no clue. But hey, chaos can be fun, right? Keeps life interesting!

question: Do you worry a lot?

It's like my brain is constantly playing a game of "What's the Worst That Could Happen?" But hey, at least worrying keeps me on my toes, right?

question: Do you tend to be quiet?
response_open: Raj: Oh, absolutely! I mean, I'm practically the poster child for being quiet. It's like my superpower, but instead of saving the world, I just make awkward situations even more awkward. It's a gift, really.

question: Are you generally trusting?

question: Do you tend to be lazy?

question: Are you emotionally stable, not easily upset?

question: Do you have an assertive personality?
